ygData.subject: My morning..
ygData.msgSnippet: Hello all! I just wanted to tell you about my morning and about a very irritating person in Rodcet Nife. Today I entered Crush Bone right after a nasty train
ygData.messageBody:
Hello all!

I just wanted to tell you about my morning and about a very irritating
person in Rodcet Nife. Today I entered Crush Bone right after a nasty train
had chased me out. I came upon a TROLL (His name is/was Bezerker) who con'd
green to me (He was ALSO very twinked..FULL Crafted..Exe. Axe etc. ) and was
be being hit on by a lowly GREEN orc. Needless to say we all know the woes
of trying to loot while having something hit us..we don't like it. SO, I
kill the greeny orc. Bezerker THEN curses me out for being a KS'er and says
he has reported me. I was STUNNED! I spoke with him a few moments to assure
him of my good intent but he would have none of it. Upon exiting CB I saw
him in a duel with another PC. The PC won and I applauded. The Bezerker
person was apparently not to bright because he was BOUND in G Fay and had
died numerous times. I was impressed to see that he undone himself by dying
too much. Upon getting killed ONCE more by Orcs, his TWINKED body
Decayed...EVERYTHING he had on him was GONE** POOF**. I know now that there
is a goddess and she loves me :)

Signed,

Gypsiee (Sandy)
